channel.title: Tutorials on RW
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on RW

item.title: Shiny Apps
item.description: I have recently begin teaching myself how to build Web Apps in Shiny Below is my second Shiny App: An interactive map for viewing US presidential election reuslts: USA Presidential Elections Below is the first Shiny App I made: It’s an interface for viewing raw ECG data some summary statistics: My First Shiny App: Viewing ECG Data My dissertation is largely focused on studying Heart Rate Variability (HRV), and having an easy way to visulaise cardiac data is really helpful for ensuring data integrity.

item.title: Tidyverse Tutorials
item.description: Below are several tutorials I’ve created to introduce the basics of tidyverse programming Tutorial 1: Creating some data Tutorial 2: Importing and manipulating data Tutorial 3: Plotting with ggplot
